ValidationRule.description: Before an Opportunity with a Subscription Quote can be moved beyond 75%, the account needs to be registered as a client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')) , Primary_Oracle_Quote__r.IsSubscriptionQuote__c , NOT(ISBLANK(ClientTracking__r.Id)) , Probability >= 0.75 , PRIORVALUE(Probability) < 0.75 , OR(ISBLANK( Account.Paychex_CAID__c ) ,ISBLANK(ClientTracking__r.RegistrationStatusCode__c ) ,ISBLANK(ClientTracking__r.RegistrationEnd__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your primary quote contains one or more products that will be billed in the the new billing system. Next Step: Before moving to Sold, complete the 'Setup New Client' process using the button on the Client Setup and Onboarding panel on your opportunity.
